author: dims
msg: Fix for Axis2 build break when using this javamail implementation. Stop when you get no more bytes from the input stream. Don't explicitly check for -1

author: rickhall
msg: Modified our hack to guess when boot delegation is necessary to check for
and ignore the Proxy class on the stack. Also now when checking to see if
the class loader of the class on the call stack is a bundle class loader,
it also walks up the class loader hierarchy just in case the class loader
is a custom class loader from a bundle.

author: rott
msg: Restore accidentally removed function from jawor in 545829

author: rickhall
msg: Modified isAssignableTo() to check if the provider bundle is the exporter
